name: QmlLive
tagline: A live coding environment for QML
body:
### Welcome to QmlLive

QmlLive is a local and remote QtQuick live reloading system. It allows you to change your QML user interface source code and view the result in almost realtime.

Often in user interface development you need to edit the placement or animations of the user interface to provide the exact user experience envisioned by the design team. This process of try-and-error is tedious with a classical edit-save-run-exit cycle. With QmlLive this cycle is way more effective. The scene is automatically reloaded when a document change is detected.

A live reloading system opens a complete new world of possibilities and makes your work so much more delightful.

### Qt Automotive Suite

QmlLive is part of the Qt Automotive Suite. 

Qt Automotive Suite is a collection of software components and tools to enable development of In-Vehicle-Infotainment (IVI) systems. Qt Automotive Suite includes an embedded development environment with additional tools for rapid UI development, as well as application introspection and debugging.


See also:
- https://blog.qt.io/blog/2016/06/08/announcing-the-qt-automotive-suite/
- https://doc.qt.io/QtAutomotiveSuite/

### Licensing

QmlLive is licensed under the GPLv3 and commercially via the Qt Automotive Suite. See the License file.

### Contributions
